attributes.action: Stop the panning/ building on Mundon field
attributes.additional_details: Nice green area 1 of a few open green spaces left
attributes.background: Stop planning/ building on Mundon field

rejection.details:
Decisions about planning permission for local developments is a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
